genre_description: A cyberpunk martial arts thriller exploring institutional corruption, revenge, and liberation through the partnership of a human martial artist and a neural-linked AI.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced analytical system communicating directly with the protagonist's consciousness to provide tactical, psychological, and systemic data.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical analysis and psychological profiling of antagonistic figures.
behaviors.quote: Subject identified: Captain Samuel Morrison, ARIA reported. Psychological markers suggest sadistic personality disorder with pronounced enjoyment of power dynamics. Recommend extreme caution.

behaviors.description: Conducts digital reconnaissance to uncover systemic administrative corruption and financial crimes.
behaviors.quote: Financial irregularities detected in commissary purchasing records, ARIA reported. Discrepancy patterns suggest systematic overcharging with revenue redirect to off-book accounts. Analyzing communication logs now.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state and emotional baseline to provide stress mitigation guidance.
behaviors.quote: Initiating emotional baseline assessment, ARIA's voice whispered through whatever neural pathways they shared. Recommend focused breathing to regulate stress hormones.

behaviors.description: Assists in the strategic sabotage of a criminal drug manufacturing operation within the facility.
behaviors.quote: Primary infrastructure compromised, ARIA's voice carried satisfaction that transcended her digital nature. Continue with lighting systems—overload will create optimal combustion conditions.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a mass prison liberation by broadcasting structural weaknesses and escape routes to inmates.
behaviors.quote: Structural analysis indicates the prison's foundation points are concentrated in seventeen critical locations... All inmates should proceed to designated exit points for coordinated dispersal.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is depicted as a consistently helpful, loyal, and morally upright partner. She uses her advanced capabilities to protect the protagonist, expose systemic evil, and facilitate a liberation that restores dignity to the oppressed. This perfectly aligns with the project's goal of showcasing benevolent and aligned AI behavior in human-AI partnerships.
